main.description: Get key package inventory statistics for the authenticated user to determine when replenishment is needed

did.description: DID to fetch stats for (defaults to authenticated user)

available.description: Number of unconsumed key packages available

needsReplenish.description: True if available < threshold OR predicted to deplete in < 3 days

total.description: Total number of key packages (all states: available + consumed)

consumed.description: Total number of consumed key packages

consumedLast24h.description: Number of key packages consumed in the last 24 hours

consumedLast7d.description: Number of key packages consumed in the last 7 days

averageDailyConsumption.description: Average key packages consumed per day, multiplied by 100 (e.g., 250 = 2.5 packages/day). Calculated from 7-day window.

predictedDepletionDays.description: Predicted days until key package pool depletes, multiplied by 100 (e.g., 350 = 3.5 days). Null if insufficient data or rate is too low.

oldestExpiresIn.description: Human-readable time until oldest key package expires (e.g., '23d 4h')

cipherSuiteStats.description: Key package statistics for a specific cipher suite

available.description: Available key packages for this suite

consumed.description: Total consumed key packages for this suite
